name: Pizza Factory
address: Pizza Factory, 5-4300 Kingsway, Burnaby, BC V5H 1Z8, Canada

hasMenuItem.name: Lasagna
hasMenuItem.description: Lasagna with your choice of sauce baked with cheese served with garlic toast.

hasMenuItem.name: Wings
hasMenuItem.description: A dozen marinated and baked wings, your choice of flavour.

hasMenuItem.name: Spaghetti
hasMenuItem.description: Spaghetti with your choice of sauce baked with cheese served with garlic toast.

hasMenuItem.name: Super Hawaiian
hasMenuItem.description: Ham, pineapple, bacon, mozzarella cheese on a tomato sauce base.

hasMenuItem.name: Butter Chicken
hasMenuItem.description: Chicken, onions, green peppers, mushrooms, tomatoes, mozzarella cheese on Saffron’s famous butter sauce base.

hasMenuItem.name: Pop (2 ltr)
hasMenuItem.description: 2-liter soda options include 7-Up, C-Plus, Coca Cola, Diet Coca Cola, and Rootbeer.

hasMenuItem.name: Garlic Cheesy Sticks
hasMenuItem.description: Cheesy garlic sticks served with tomato sauce dip.

hasMenuItem.name: Large Create Your Own (1)
hasMenuItem.description: Large pizza with choice of sauce: BBQ, garlic, saffron's butter, tomato pesto, or classic tomato.

hasMenuItem.name: Medium Create Your Own (1)
hasMenuItem.description: Medium pizza with choice of sauce: BBQ, garlic, saffron's butter, tomato pesto, or classic tomato.

hasMenuItem.name: Vegetarian Samosas
hasMenuItem.description: Four cocktail vegetarian samosas served with tamarind chutney.

hasMenuItem.name: Paneer Makhani
hasMenuItem.description: Paneer, onions, green peppers, mushrooms, mozzarella cheese on saffron’s famous butter sauce base.

hasMenuItem.name: Small Create Your Own (1)
hasMenuItem.description: Our mozzarella blend with your choice of sauce and toppings.

hasMenuItem.name: Small Create Your Own (2)
hasMenuItem.description: Two small pizzas with our mozzarella cheese and your choice of toppings and sauce.

review.reviewBody: Haven't had pizza factory in so long, I forgot how much I like the Garlic Lover. Took away a star because the Vegetarian Pakora was missing from my order.
Way better than I expected! Probably the best I've tried in Vancouver!!!!
The pizza was over priced for the size you get and the wings were soggy and not spicy at all. Overall disappointing
got the Lasagna with cheese Garlic Toast with Cheese was a little over cooked kinda watery its the Lasagna Garlic Toast with Cheese was cold
